name: GMIWare
description:
GMIWare is a collection of fast and fun microgames made by the talented developers of the Italian GameMaker Community, "GMI"!

Now you are a cloud. Pick all the baloons... Oh! Now you're a snail! Eat the.. No! You now must use your shield and save the planet! Good! And now avoid that ghost! Done? Now race with your car! Quick! Oh! You lost.

Quickly solve all the simple challenges before the time is up. The game becomes progressively more difficult and quick, so try your best to keep up!

Online leaderboards are also featured. Who will be the best in the world? Don't lose your babba's!
